content: this guy is only 2 5 tall and 1 25 wide my goal with this pattern was to make a mini gnome with no sewing enjoy your new mini no sew gnome connect with me here 1 i do not charge for my patterns but if you would like to support my work you can tip me on venmo @thoseyellowthings 1 https //www flowcode com/page/thoseyellowthings
